titles: An advertisement from their Majesties General Post-Office, London it being notorious, that many ill-minded persons, for some wicked designes against the Government, have dispersed in coffee-houses, and other publick places of meeting, divers most infamous scandals of their Majesties General Post-Office; ...
author: England and Wales. Post Office.
notes: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Postal service --  England --  Early works to 1800.
